Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which we believe is an absolute game-changer in its field. This product holds immense value for us and has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Given its exceptional capabilities and the impact it can have on your endeavors, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. We are confident that you will find this investment not only cost-effective but also incredibly beneficial for your business or personal needs. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information to make an informed decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
